info.author: MTA contributors (github.com/multitheftauto/mtasa-resources)
info.name: SA Map Fixes
info.description: This resource patches a few flaws in the default MTA world

setting.name: *crack_palace_interior
setting.desc: Enable Big Smoke Crack Palace open-world interior map

setting.name: *atrium_lobby_interior
setting.desc: Enable Commerce Atrium lobby open-world interior map

setting.name: *garage_doherty_interior
setting.desc: Enable Doherty Safehouse Garage open-world interior map

setting.name: *nodamage_crackfactory_interior
setting.desc: Enable restored Undamaged SF Crack Factory with open-world interior map
